annotations.name: World
annotations.description: The world. All objects in the world should be accessible from here. If not, they will not be persisted in the live image.

annotations.name: Modules
annotations.description: An object that contains all of the modules currently loaded into the program. You can launch modules from here in order to write them out to a file.

Chance.description: Takes in a probability `prob` and returns true with probability `prob`.

Choice.description: Takes in an array and returns a random element from that array.

annotations.name: FTS
annotations.description: From the Stars - an X-Com inspired tactical strategy game.

annotations.name: GameWindow
annotations.description: The main window where an in-progress game will be shown.

annotations.name: MorningPhase
annotations.description: During this phase, you determine the hunting party assignment of the tribe members.

annotations.name: TopObject
annotations.description: The Object at the top of the inheritance heirarchy. All objects should descend from this.

SetSlotAnnotation.data: function(slot, name, value) { _SetSlotAnnotation(this, slot, name, value); }

AddSlot.description: Takes in a slot name and value, and creates a slot on this object.

Extend.description: Creates a new object with this object as a parent.

annotations.name: CreatorAnnotation
annotations.description: Used to annotate an object with the slot that 'creates' it. By following 'creator' annotations, the module exporter can determine the path of the object from World.

annotations.name: Core
annotations.description: A collection of core objects that should exist in every world.

annotations.name: Interface
annotations.description: A collection of objects related to the user interface.

annotations.name: WindowManager
annotations.description: The window manager and entry point for the render and update main loop.

annotations.name: HandlerEditor
annotations.description: The default editor for message handlers.
The Main Menu at the top of the screen.
annotations.name: MainMenu
Encounter
annotations.description: An encounter is a battle that takes place between Hunters and enemies, be it game or aliens.
